cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.DM, cs.IT, cs.SY. 

The paper deals with stochastic multi-armed bandits, which is a well-studied problem in machine learning and optimization. The focus of the paper is on unimodal bandits, which is a specific class of multi-armed bandits where the expected reward is a unimodal function over partially ordered arms. This problem is relevant to several areas of computer science, including machine learning (cs.LG), artificial intelligence (cs.AI), data mining (cs.DM), information theory (cs.IT), and control systems (cs.SY). The paper provides lower bounds and optimal algorithms for this problem, which are important contributions to the field.
